thoughts.text: I have saved the information about the Inca empire to a file. Now I can use the list_files command to list all the files in the current directory.
thoughts.reasoning: I have saved the information about the Inca empire to a file. I want to check if the file has been saved correctly, and the list_files command can be used to do that.
thoughts.plan: - Use the list_files command to list all the files in the current directory.
